mapper.select: SELECT crew_member_id as crewMemberId, member_id as memberId, is_leader as isLeader, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createdAt FROM crew_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND crew_id = #{crewId}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM crew_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_leader = 'Y'
SELECT CM.member_id FROM crew_member CM JOIN crew C ON CM.crew_id = C.crew_id WHERE CM.is_leader = 'Y' AND C.crew_id = (SELECT crew_id FROM crew_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew_member (crew_member_id, member_id, crew_id, is_leader, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) VALUES (seq_crew_member.nextval, #{memberId}, #{crewId}, 'N', systimestamp, #{loginMemberId}, systimestamp, #{loginMemberId})

SELECT cm.member_id as memberId, m.nickname as nickname, m.email as email, m.profile_path as profilePath, TO_CHAR(cm.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as registerDate, cm.is_leader as isLeader FROM crew_member cm JOIN member m ON cm.member_id = m.member_id WHERE cm.crew_id = #{crewId}
ORDER BY cm.created_at DESC
ORDER BY cm.created_at ASC
